ai.skymind.pipelines.input.converter

Class ConverterVerticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
      • ai.skymind.pipelines.verticles.base.BaseRoutableVerticle
        • ai.skymind.pipelines.input.converter.ConverterVerticle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Routable, io.vertx.core.Verticle

    public class ConverterVerticle
extends ai.skymind.pipelines.verticles.base.BaseRoutableVerticle
    A Verticle for defining a set of converters for various kinds of files to different file formats. This Verticle expects 2 arguments in its json configuration: uploadKey: This is the field in the configuration that should contain the uplload directory. The default value for this is just the current working directory/upload. unzipKey: The place to unzip files to. This is for handling endpoints that require uploading a zip file to extract the contents.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
